item.title: 美联储后交易员 "继续狂欢"，PGIM仍为债券投资组合保驾护航
item.description: 上周，在美联储决策者就今年降息发出令人欣慰的信号后，国债出现了缓解性反弹，帮助市场从会议前的小幅震荡中恢复过来。对格雷格-彼得斯（Greg Peters）来说，这还是老一套。【原文：Treasury bonds staged a relief rally last week after Federal Reserve policymakers sent reassuring signals about rate cuts this year, helping the market recover from a mini-rout leading up to the meeting. For Greg Peters, it was the same old story.】

item.title: 2023 年美联储运营亏损将增至创纪录的 1,143 亿美元
item.description: 美联储 2023 年的支出比收益多出 1 143 亿美元，这是其有史以来最大的经营亏损，迫使美国央行在利率持续走高的情况下放弃向财政部汇款。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s expenses exceeded its earnings in 2023 by $114.3 billion, its largest operating loss ever, forcing the US central bank to forgo remittances to the Treasury as interest rates remain elevated.】

item.title: 加密货币风险投资支持者对牛市炒作心存疑虑
item.description: 比特币创纪录的涨势推动数字资产市场今年跃升了 1 万亿美元，由此判断，加密货币热又回来了。但是，透过表象看风险投资的趋势，我们会发现一幅更为冷静的图景。【原文：Judging by a record Bitcoin rally that fueled a $1 trillion jump in the digital-asset market this year, crypto fever is back. But look beneath the surface to trends in venture capital and a far more sober picture emerges.】

item.title: 银行首次公开募股后，阿尔及利亚证券交易所市值跃升七倍
item.description: 阿尔及利亚的主要股票市场周二增长了七倍，在国家控制的阿尔及利亚人民信贷银行首次公开发行股票后，市值接近 40 亿美元。【原文：Algeria’s main stock market swelled sevenfold on Tuesday, approaching a $4 billion market capitalization after the initial public offering of state-controlled bank Credit Populaire d’Algerie.】

item.title: 石油制裁对俄罗斯出口造成的真正直接损失
item.description: 西方针对俄罗斯石油出口机器的制裁对莫斯科的伤害到底有多大？【原文：How much are western sanctions targeting Russia’s petroleum-export machine really hurting Moscow?】

item.title: 法国威胁对基辅的国防企业实施权力限制
item.description: 法国正在向其国防工业施压，要求它们加快为乌克兰生产装备，政府威胁要对其认为生产速度太慢的公司行使权力。【原文：France is putting pressure on its defense industry to accelerate production of equipment for Ukraine, with the government threatening to impose its authority on companies it believes are too slow.】

item.title: Zoetis 因狗用止痛药遭欧盟反垄断调查
item.description: 欧盟委员会正在调查美国动物保健公司Zoetis Inc.阻止一种治疗狗慢性疼痛的竞争药品上市是否违反了反垄断法。【原文：The European Commission is investigating whether US animal health company Zoetis Inc. breached antitrust laws by preventing the market launch of a competing medicine to treat chronic pain in dogs.】

item.title: 加纳将于下周开始与债券持有人进行债务谈判
item.description: 加纳财政部长穆罕默德-阿明-亚当（Mohammed Amin Adam）表示，加纳政府将在下周开始与国际债券持有人就约 130 亿美元违约债务的重组问题进行谈判。【原文：Ghana’s government will begin talks with international bondholders on the restructuring of about $13 billion of defaulted debt in the coming week, Finance Minister Mohammed Amin Adam said.】

item.title: Invesco 称美联储降息后大宗商品将反弹
item.description: Invesco Ltd.表示，央行降息时，大宗商品通常会反弹，这为未来几个月做多原材料提供了支持。【原文：Commodities usually rally when central banks cut interest rates, bolstering the case for going long raw materials in the coming months, according to Invesco Ltd.】

item.title: 加拿大将收紧针对人工智能和太空技术的外国投资规则
item.description: 加拿大将加强对人工智能、量子计算和空间技术领域外国投资的审查，同时政府将扩大其权力，以国家安全为由拖延和阻止交易。【原文：Canada will tighten its scrutiny of foreign investments in artificial intelligence, quantum computing and space technology as the government expands its power to stall and block deals for national security reasons.】

item.title: 桥梁垮塌引发对通胀性供应冲击的担忧
item.description:
花旗银行的霍伦霍斯特认为，在经历了数月的平静之后，经济将受到严厉的提醒

。【原文：

Citi’s Hollenhorst sees a harsh reminder for economy after months of calm

】

item.title: Rite Aid 接近达成全面债权人协议以避免清算
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Rite Aid 公司正接近与主要债券持有人和其他债权人团体达成协议，这将使该连锁药店避免破产清算。【原文：Rite Aid Corp. is nearing a deal with key bondholders and other creditor groups that will allow the pharmacy chain to avoid a liquidation, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 苏威出售 15 亿欧元债券，这是公司分拆后的首次出售
item.description: 索尔维公司（Solvay SA）自 12 月分拆部分业务以来的首次发行吸引了超过 88 亿欧元的竞标，这是投资者对债务需求有增无减的最新迹象。【原文：Solvay SA’s first issue since it spun out some of its business in December has pulled in more than €8.8 billion of bids, in the latest sign that investors’ appetite for debt is unabated.】

item.title: 新兴市场企业的 "崩溃后 "市场吸引着全球交易者
item.description: Muzinich & Co.表示，随着违约风险的减弱以及市场对经济软着陆的信心增强，新兴市场企业债有望卷土重来。【原文：Emerging-market corporate debt is poised to see a comeback as default risks fade and markets grow more confident about a soft landing, according to Muzinich & Co.】

item.title: 亚马逊将处方药当日送达服务扩展至纽约和洛杉矶
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在将处方药的当日送达服务扩展到纽约市和大洛杉矶地区，使客户能够在数小时内收到治疗流感、糖尿病和其他疾病的药物。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is expanding same-day delivery of prescription medication to New York City and the greater Los Angeles area, allowing customers to receive drugs for the flu, diabetes and other conditions within hours.】

item.title: 美国各城市房价 "健康增长"，房价涨幅回升
item.description: 在经历了近 30 年来最糟糕的房地产销售年之后，美国房价增长速度达到了自 2022 年以来的最快速度，从而加大了购房者的压力。【原文：Home-price growth in the US accelerated at the fastest rate since 2022, increasing pressure on buyers after the worst year for property sales in nearly three decades.】

item.title: Signa 坠毁后，Galeria 与两家竞购者商谈收购事宜
item.description: 德国连锁百货公司 Galeria Kaufhof GmbH 因 Rene Benko 旗下的 Signa 企业集团崩溃而破产，目前正与两家竞购者商谈收购事宜。【原文：German department store chain Galeria Kaufhof GmbH is in talks with two bidders for a potential takeover following an insolvency triggered by the meltdown at Rene Benko’s Signa conglomerate.】

item.title: 电池金属暴跌后，中国矿商关注海外交易
item.description:
紫金集团和招商局集团在西方国家撤军之际将目光投向海外扩张，这可能有助于中国加强对关键矿产的控制。【原文：

Zijin and CMOC Group set sights on overseas expansion amid a Western pullback, potentially helping China tighten its grip on critical minerals.

】

item.title: Viking Therapeutics 因早期减肥药研究成果而跃升
item.description: Viking Therapeutics 公司在盘前交易中大幅上涨，因为这家初创公司公布了其实验性减肥药的早期研究结果，该产品有望与流行的肥胖针剂竞争。【原文：Viking Therapeutics Inc. rose sharply in premarket trading after the startup unveiled results from an early study of its experimental weight-loss pill, a product expected to compete with popular obesity shots.】

item.title: 印度顶级银行因股价退市面临股东反弹
item.description: 印度第二大私人贷款机构 ICICI 银行正面临一些小股东对其经纪部门退市提议的反弹，因为他们认为估值低于其公允价值。【原文：India’s second-largest private lender ICICI Bank is facing backlash from some minority shareholders over the proposed delisting of its broking unit as they say the valuation is below its fair value.】

item.title: 除了天价股价，英伟达交易员还找到了担心的理由
item.description: 英伟达公司自2023年初以来的上涨是如此突然和强劲，以至于即使是看涨的投资者也开始担心其股价还能有多大的上涨空间。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s runup since the start of 2023 has been so sudden and strong that even bullish investors are raising concerns about how much room its shares have left to run.】

item.title: 诺沃格拉茨的银河公司因加密货币反弹而实现季度盈利
item.description: 迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）的银河数字控股有限公司（Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd.）在数字资产价格上涨和交易量增加的推动下，第四季度扭亏为盈。【原文：Michael Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital Holdings Ltd. swung to a profit in the fourth quarter, bolstered by rising digital asset prices and increased trading volumes.】

item.title: 挪威 1.6 万亿美元基金对英国 IPO 提议表示担忧
item.description: 挪威1.6万亿美元的主权财富基金警告说，英国金融行为监管局简化公开上市规则的计划可能会损害投资者对市场的信心。【原文：Norway’s $1.6 trillion sovereign wealth fund warned that the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority’s plan to simplify rules around public listings could undermine investor confidence in the market.】

item.title: 肯尼亚总统鲁托提出新的宏伟目标：平衡预算
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）希望东非经济体在其任期结束前实现预算平衡，这将是自二十年前出现财政盈余以来的第一次。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto wants the East African economy running a balanced budget before the end of his term, which would make it a first since a fiscal surplus two decades ago.】

item.title: 亿万富翁贝希托尔斯海姆被美国证券交易委员会指控进行内幕交易
item.description: 安德烈亚斯-贝希托尔斯海姆（Andreas Bechtolsheim）是太阳微系统公司（Sun Microsystems Inc.【原文：Andreas Bechtolsheim, a billionaire founder of Sun Microsystems Inc. and Arista Networks Inc., will be barred from serving as an executive or board member of a public company for five years after the Securities and Exchange Commission accused him of insider trading.】

item.title: 即使预算赤字不断扩大，安大略省仍将在住房和交通方面投入资金
item.description: 安大略省政府将在周二公布的新预算案中把基础设施支出列为优先事项，甚至不惜与魁北克省和不列颠哥伦比亚省一样出现更大的赤字。【原文：Ontario’s government will put infrastructure spending high on its list of priorities when it delivers a new budget Tuesday, even at the risk of joining Quebec and British Columbia with even larger deficits.】

item.title: TikTok 影响者因金融促销面临英国禁令
item.description: 英国一家顶级监管机构警告社交媒体影响者，如果他们在向消费者推销金融产品时不提供适当的风险警告，将面临长达两年的监禁。【原文：A top UK regulator warned social media influencers that they face as long as two years in prison if they don’t provide proper risk warnings when pitching consumers on financial products.】

item.title: 公司债券近十年来最安全
item.description: 自宽松货币时代初期以来，全球高等级信贷市场的质量从未如此之好。【原文：The quality of the global high-grade credit market hasn’t been this good since the early stages of the easy money era.】

item.title: 花旗英国首席执行官指出 "有选择性 "地招聘，现在改革已经完成
item.description: 花旗集团英国首席执行官蒂娜-李（Tiina Lee）表示，该银行的管理层改革已经结束，现在准备 "有选择性地 "进行招聘。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s UK chief executive officer Tiina Lee said the bank’s management overhaul was over and it’s now ready to “selectively” hire.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 公司投资者电话会议引发一周疯狂债券交易
item.description: 法国奥迪斯公司（Altice France SA）戏剧性的一周引发了该公司债券的激烈交易，至少 20 亿美元的相关债务易手。【原文：A dramatic week for Altice France SA sparked intense trading in its bonds, with at least $2 billion of debt linked to the firm changing hands.】
